Work and Stay in NoMad NYC

Area Businesses

Located on 27th Street between Fifth and Madison Avenues, The Evelyn is nestled in the heart of Manhattan which is convenient for those of our guests who travel to New York City on business. The Evelyn is favored by many corporate travelers with offices in NoMad and other adjacent neighborhoods. Offering distinctive boutique accommodations with classic New York City character, The Evelyn is a top choice among New York Business hotels.

Area Businesses:

  • NY Life Insurance Company
  • GoldPoint Partners
  • CBS Sports
  • 295 5th Avenue: The Textile Building
